name: projetoIA
postCreateCommand: if [ ! -d "~/.venv" ] || [ ! -f "~/.venv/bin/activate" ]; then python -m venv ~/.venv; fi && . ~/.venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && if [ -f /workspace/install.sh ]; then bash /workspace/install.sh; else echo 'install.sh not found, skipping'; fi && if ! grep -qx "source ~/.venv/bin/activate" ~/.bashrc 2>/dev/null; then echo 'source ~/.venv/bin/activate' >> ~/.bashrc; fi
